<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@700;900&family=DM+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
:root {
  --bg: #e8efe8;
  --bg-card: #f0f5f0;
  --ink: #0a2010;
  --ink-mid: #2a4a2a;
  --ink-light: #4a6a4a;
  --sage: #8aaa8a;
  --sage-light: #c0d4c0;
  --sage-mid: #dde8dd;
  --orange: #FF9900;
  --white: #ffffff;
}

*, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }

body {
  background-color: var(--bg);
  color: var(--ink);
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

@keyframes fadeUp {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(14px); }
  to   { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}
.fade1 { animation: fadeUp 0.55s ease both; }
.fade2 { animation: fadeUp 0.55s 0.12s ease both; }
.fade3 { animation: fadeUp 0.55s 0.24s ease both; }
.fade4 { animation: fadeUp 0.55s 0.36s ease both; }

/* ── NAV ── */
nav {
  background-color: var(--bg);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  padding: 0 3.5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  height: 60px;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
}
.nav-left { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 3rem; }
.nav-brand {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-weight: 900;
  color: var(--ink);
  text-decoration: none;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}
.nav-links { display: flex; gap: 2.5rem; list-style: none; }
.nav-links a {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.73rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--ink-light);
  text-decoration: none;
  letter-spacing: 1.2px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: color 0.15s;
}
.nav-links a:hover { color: var(--ink); }
.nav-right-group { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1.4rem; }
.nav-right {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.73rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--ink);
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-decoration-color: var(--orange);
  text-underline-offset: 4px;
  text-decoration-thickness: 2px;
  letter-spacing: 1.2px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.github-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  color: var(--ink-light);
  transition: color 0.2s;
}
.github-link:hover { color: var(--ink); }
.github-link svg { width: 18px; height: 18px; }

/* ── HERO ── */
.hero {
  max-width: 1140px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 7rem 3.5rem 6rem;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 220px;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
}
.hero-kicker {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: 3px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--sage);
  margin-bottom: 1.6rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}
.hero-kicker::before {
  content: '';
  display: block;
  width: 36px;
  height: 1px;
  background: var(--sage);
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
.hero-text h1 {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: clamp(3.4rem, 6.5vw, 5.5rem);
  font-weight: 900;
  color: var(--ink);
  line-height: 0.95;
  margin-bottom: 2.2rem;
  letter-spacing: -3px;
}
.hero-text p {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.97rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  color: var(--ink-mid);
  line-height: 1.9;
  max-width: 500px;
  margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
}
.hero-right {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0;
}
.hero-img-placeholder {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: linear-gradient(160deg, #d0e0d0 0%, #8aaa8a 100%);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.68rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #3a5a3a;
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  border: 6px solid var(--bg);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(10,32,16,0.15), 0 0 0 1px var(--sage-light);
}

/* ── BUTTONS ── */
.btn-row { display: flex; gap: 0.8rem; margin-top: 2.6rem; flex-wrap: wrap; }
.btn {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  padding: 0.72rem 1.9rem;
  border-radius: 2px;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  letter-spacing: 1.2px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: all 0.15s;
}
.btn-primary { background-color: var(--ink); color: var(--bg); }
.btn-primary:hover { background-color: #1c4a1c; }
.btn-outline { border: 1.5px solid var(--ink); color: var(--ink); background: transparent; }
.btn-outline:hover { background-color: var(--sage-mid); }

/* ── SECTION HEADER ── */
.section-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: baseline;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  padding-bottom: 0.8rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
}
.section-header h2 {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--ink);
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}
.section-header span {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.68rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--sage);
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* ── sec-header (needed because imported map uses sec-header) ── */
.sec-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: baseline;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding-bottom: 0.8rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}
.sec-header h2 {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--ink);
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}
.sec-header span {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.68rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--sage);
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* ── PROJECTS ── */
.section {
  max-width: 1140px;
  margin: 6rem auto;
  padding: 0 3.5rem;
}
.project-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  gap: 1.1rem;
}
.project-card {
  background: var(--bg-card);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 2rem 1.6rem 1.8rem;
  border: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  transition: box-shadow 0.2s, border-color 0.2s;
}
.project-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 6px 28px rgba(10,32,16,0.09);
  border-color: var(--sage);
}
.project-card-num {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 2.6rem;
  font-weight: 900;
  color: var(--sage-light);
  line-height: 1;
  margin-bottom: 1.1rem;
}
.tag {
  display: inline-block;
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: 1.3px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  padding: 0.2rem 0.65rem;
  border-radius: 2px;
  margin-bottom: 0.9rem;
  width: fit-content;
}
.tag-done { background: #d0ecd0; color: #1a4a1a; }
.tag-soon { background: var(--sage-mid); color: var(--ink-light); }
.project-card h3 {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.88rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--ink);
  margin-bottom: 0.55rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.1px;
}
.project-card p {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.82rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  color: var(--ink-light);
  line-height: 1.7;
  flex: 1;
  margin-bottom: 1.4rem;
}
.project-card a {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--ink);
  text-decoration: none;
  letter-spacing: 0.8px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  padding-bottom: 2px;
  width: fit-content;
  transition: border-color 0.15s;
}
.project-card a:hover { border-color: var(--ink); }

/* ══════════════════════════════
   MAP (imported)
══════════════════════════════ */
.map-section {
  max-width: 1160px;
  margin: 5.5rem auto;
  padding: 0 4rem 6rem;
}
.map-frame-outer {
  background: var(--sage-mid);
  border: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(8,24,8,0.06);
}
.map-frame-outer .leaflet-container {
  border-radius: 4px !important;
}

/* ── FOOTER ── */
footer {
  border-top: 1px solid var(--sage-light);
  padding: 2rem 3.5rem;
  max-width: 1140px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}
footer span {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.72rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: var(--sage);
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}
footer a {
  font-family: 'DM Sans', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.72rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--ink-light);
  text-decoration: none;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
footer a:hover { color: var(--ink); }

@media (max-width: 960px) {
  .project-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  nav { padding: 0 1.5rem; }
  .hero { grid-template-columns: 1fr; padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem; gap: 2.5rem; }
  .section { padding: 0 1.5rem 3rem; }
  .map-section { padding-left: 1.5rem; padding-right: 1.5rem; padding-bottom: 3rem; }
  .project-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
  footer { padding: 1.5rem; flex-direction: column; gap: 0.5rem; text-align: center; }
}
</style>
